content: froot loop gloves by natasha sills inspired by froot loop socks by kristi geraci knitty spring 08 materials 1 ball numma numma doppio shown in color spiced apple or substitute 100 grams of any fingering weight sock yarn for women s size s/m us #1 dpns for women s size m/l us #2 dpns gauge 34 sts/44 row = 4 inches in stockinette chart abbreviations rli - right leaning increase lli - left leaning increase pm - place marker sm - slip marker pu - pick up stitches tbl - through back loop s2kpo - slip 2 stitches together knitwise knit next stitch pass both stitches over rt right twist k2tog but do not drop sts from left needle begin thumb increases insert right needle between sts just worked together and k round 1 k2 pattern 26 sts sm rli k to marker pattern 5 k to into first st again drop both sts from left needle marker lli sm knit 18 close loop insert right needle into third st on left needle note whenever the instructions pattern 5 appear on a thumb or and draw this st over first 2 sts on left needle k1 yo k1 finger it will always refer to the 3-stitch froot loop cable and a purl stitch on either side regardless of the increases happening around it this cable should remain consistent round 2-4 k2 pattern 26 k to marker pattern 5 knit to end of round both gloves repeat rounds 1-4 another 6 times for a total of 15 pattern cast on 63 sts repeats 69 stitches divide sts evenly between 3 needles placing 21 sts on each needle join to begin working in the round being careful not to twist next round k2 pattern 26 k3 place next 17 stitches on a holder cast on 5 k3 remove marker knit to end of round round 1 k2 tbl p1 k1 tbl p1 k1 tbl p1 9 times subsequent row k2 pattern 26 knit to end of round repeat this round until work measures 1 about 7 rounds continue in this manner until you have 20 total pattern repeats work rounds 1-4 of chart 7 times or until glove reaches base of pinkie finger rh pinkie finger right glove only round 1 k2 pattern 5 k1 place next 41 sts on a holder cast on 3 round 1 k2 place marker pattern 26 sts pm k2 pm pattern 5 sts knit to end of round 19 pinkie sts pm k2 pm k1 s2kpo k4 three times s2kpo k1 subsequent pinkie rounds k2 pattern 5 knit to end of round round 2-4 k2 pattern 26 k2 pattern 5 knit 20 continue until you have 27 total pattern repeats need help e-mail questions to natasha@grittyknits com when knitting gloves it s a good idea to try them on occasionally and customize the finger length irecommend continuing in pattern until your finger tip is just barely visible above the needles first decrease round k2tog
